sentences.en: a delicate child
sentences.cn: 身体娇弱的孩子

sentences.en: a delicate watch mechanism
sentences.cn: 精致的手表机件

sentences.en: a plate with a delicate pattern of leaves
sentences.cn: 有精致树叶图案的碟子

sentences.en: Although the coral looks hard, it is very delicate.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚虽然看上去坚固，实际上非常易碎。

sentences.en: delicate hand-cut glass
sentences.cn: 易碎的手工刻花玻璃

sentences.en: delicate negotiations
sentences.cn: 微妙的谈判

sentences.en: Everything you see exists together in a delicate balance.
sentences.cn: 世间万物都处在微妙的平衡中。

sentences.en: He served it up on delicate white plates.
sentences.cn: 他把它放在精美的白色碟子里端上了桌。

sentences.en: her delicate features
sentences.cn: 她娇美的五官

sentences.en: Her wrists and ankles were slim and delicate.
sentences.cn: 她的手腕和脚踝长得纤巧优雅。

sentences.en: his delicate hands
sentences.cn: 他纤细的手

sentences.en: Its large leaves often show a delicate purple tint.
sentences.cn: 它的大叶子往往带点紫色。

sentences.en: Put the plates gently on the table, they are very delicate.
sentences.cn: 把碟子轻轻放在桌上, 这些碟子非常易碎.

sentences.en: She was physically delicate and psy-chologically unstable.
sentences.cn: 她身体孱弱，心理上也不够稳定。

sentences.en: She was slender, with delicate wrists and ankles.
sentences.cn: 她身量苗条，手腕和脚踝曲线玲珑。

sentences.en: the delicate curve of her ear
sentences.cn: 她耳朵的优美曲线

sentences.en: The eye is one of the most delicate organs of the body.
sentences.cn: 眼睛是人体最娇贵的器官之一。

sentences.en: The furniture was stiff, uncomfortable, too delicate, and too neat.
sentences.cn: 家具又硬又不舒服，太不结实而且太小巧。

sentences.en: The name Latifah, by the way, means "delicate"
sentences.cn: 顺便说一句，Latifah这个名字意思是“娇嫩”。

sentences.en: The sun can easily damage a child’s delicate skin .
sentences.cn: 阳光很容易晒伤小孩娇嫩的皮肤。

sentences.en: The sun can easily damage a child’s delicate skin.
sentences.cn: 阳光很容易晒伤小孩娇嫩的皮肤。

sentences.en: Their marriage is a delicate balance between traditional and contemporary values.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻在传统和现代价值观之间保持着微妙平衡。

sentences.en: There’s something I have to speak to you about – it’s a delicate matter .
sentences.cn: 我有件事要跟你讲——是一件需要谨慎处理的事。

sentences.en: These delicate plants need careful nurturing.
sentences.cn: 这些幼嫩的植物需要精心培育。

sentences.en: Young haricot beans have a tender texture and a delicate, subtle flavour.
sentences.cn: 嫩菜豆口感细腻，味道清香、淡雅。

trans.tran_cn: 脆弱的，虚弱的，纤细的，精致的，熟练的，娇美的，柔和的，鲜美的，清香的，微妙的，技巧性很强的
trans.tran_en: a part of the body that is delicate is attractive and graceful
